definition: Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
surname Li
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
winter
(onom.) beating a drum/rat-a-tat
surname Dong

sentences.english: Then, the beginning of winter season how health?
sentences.chinese: 那么，立冬时节如何养生？

sentences.english: Today is the Beginning of Winter in 24 solar term .
sentences.chinese: 今天是二十四节气里的立冬。

sentences.english: Round about the beginning of winter he got drunk again.
sentences.chinese: 在立冬前后吧，他又喝醉。

sentences.english: Beginning of winter approaching, residents of most areas of the country felt the slightest chill.
sentences.chinese: 立冬将至，全国大部地区居民都感受到丝丝寒意。

sentences.english: It is not particularly uncommon for Hangzhou to have thunderstorm after "Lidong"(one of Chinese solar terms meaning the beginning of winter).
sentences.chinese: “立冬”过后出现雷雨，也不算特别少见。

definition: Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
midwinter/the depth of winter
solar term
Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January
season/time
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
the cool of autumn
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July
Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
Great Cold, 24th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th January-3rd February
